name: SPRING BREAK FUN FILLED ADVENTURE WEEK
description: This trip is designed for the college, spring break, outdoor, thrillseeking, traveler, that is on a budget. This a fun packed adventure filled week will take take you up to new heights and race you through canyons. You'll get to see beautiful countryside, and thrilling whitewater, centuries of history, and plenty of scenery. This trip is not for the faint of heart but will leave you with an abundance of memorable stories of a great adventures. No lounge seats and umbrella drinks on this 7 day low budget trip, just some wild woods, white water, and wide range views of West Virginia's beauty.
